data.why:
Modules that import the automation and flexibility silimlar to
    those found in PHP modules. The module(s) I am working on , in
    combination with Embperl, can emulate most if not all of the
    properties that PHP has to offer. This lets Perl Gurus add
    additional power to simpler pages or more intricacies to complex
    pages and removes the need to learn YAL (Yet Another Languange).
